bibl.title: A Collection of Papyri Mummy Labels, Ostraca and Coptic Parchments and Papers from the Second Century B.C. till the Eighth Century A.D.
bibl.note: 15 pp. et XVI pll. Avec un supplément de 2 pp.
bibl.seg: [Hakkert Adolf M.], A Collection of Papyri, Mummy Labels, Ostraca and Coptic Parchments and Papers. Demotic, Greek, Coptic and Arabic. From the second Century B.C. till the eighth Century A.D. (Acta classica. 60.)
Amsterdam, A.M. Hakkert, 1973, 8°, 15 pp. et XVI pll. Avec un supplément de 2 pp.
